name: Clown Attack Underworld Mafia War
description:
The psychopath wars of underworld - we’ve all watched a few flicks about them. Here’s your chance to be part of the action. Enjoy the most thrilling police station raid, bank robbery and mafia revenge missions. It is not going to be easy with all those cops and gangsters around but you have to plan it to perfection. You have a high-speed bike at your disposal to reach to target locations. Use your weapons sensibly and escape from the crime scene as soon as possible.

The clown is out there with a vengeance and he has a score to settle! It is going to be a thrilling and exciting ride, so buckle up and join the action.
